pkgmetadata.longdescription: Adaptive Normalization for miRNA Data // An adaptive normalization algorithm that selects housekeeping genes based on the sample level variability in the data. This is suitable for any data obtained from RT-qPCR assays. A manuscript describing the method is submitted to Genome Biology under ``MiRA-norm: An Adaptive Method for the Normalization of MicroRNA Array Data``, Yuda Zhu et al.
